value.name: West Linn plans to choose new police chief in July
value.description: PMG SCREENSHOT - Emergency Services Consulting International will lead West Linn's search for a new police chief. After firing Police Chief Terry Kruger last December, the city of West Linn has selected a recruitment firm to lead the search for the West Linn Police Department's next leader.
